post.summary: Create a new Point of Sale app
post.description: Point of Sale app allows accepting payments for items in a virtual store

put.summary: Update a Point of Sale app
put.description: Use this endpoint for updating the properties of a POS app

get.summary: Get Point of Sale app data

404.description: POS app with specified ID was not found
Crowdfund app with specified ID was not found

get.description: Returns basic app data shared between all types of apps

404.description: App with specified ID was not found
App with specified ID was not found

post.summary: Uploads an image for a app item
post.description: Uploads an image for a app item

200.description: Uploads an image for a app item

404.description: The app could not be found
The app could not be found

get.description: Returns sales statistics for the app

parameters.name: numberOfDays
parameters.description: How many of the last days

404.description: App with specified ID was not found

get.description: Returns top items statistics for the app

404.description: App with specified ID was not found

get.summary: Get basic app data for all apps for a store
get.description: Returns basic app data for all apps for a store

200.description: Array of basic app data object

403.description: If you are authenticated but forbidden to get the data

get.summary: Get basic app data for all apps for all stores for a user
get.description: Returns basic app data for all apps for all stores

200.description: Array of basic app data object

403.description: If you are authenticated but forbidden to get the data

appName.description: Name given to the app when it was created

storeId.description: Id of the store to which the app belongs

created.description: UNIX timestamp for when the app was created

appType.description: Type of the app which was created

archived.description: If true, the app does not appear in the apps list by default.

description.example: This is my amazing PoS app

defaultView.description: App view type (e.g., static, cart, etc...)

showCustomAmount.description: Whether the option to enter a custom amount is shown

showDiscount.description: Whether the option to enter a discount is shown

enableTips.description: Whether the option to enter a tip is shown

fixedAmountPayButtonText.description: Payment button text template for items with a set price

customAmountPayButtonText.description: Payment button text which appears for items which allow user to input a custom amount

tipText.description: Prompt which appears next to the tip amount field if tipping is enabled
tipText.example: Do you want to leave a tip?

customTipPercentages.description: Array of predefined tip percentage amounts

notificationUrl.description: Callback notification url to POST to once when invoice is paid for and once when there are enough blockchain confirmations

redirectUrl.description: URL user is redirected to once invoice is paid

redirectAutomatically.description: Whether user is redirected to specified redirect URL automatically after the invoice is paid

htmlLang.description: Used for SEO, the [HTML Lang](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/lang) of the page

htmlMetaTags.description: Used for SEO, the [Meta tags](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/meta) of the page

formId.description: Form ID to request customer data

template.description: JSON of item available in the app

example.title: Green Tea
example.description: Lovely, fresh and tender, Meng Ding Gan Lu ('sweet dew') is grown in the lush Meng Ding Mountains of the southwestern province of Sichuan where it has been cultivated for over a thousand years.

example.title: Black Tea
example.description: Tian Jian Tian Jian means 'heavenly tippy tea' in Chinese, and it describes the finest grade of dark tea. Our Tian Jian dark tea is from Hunan province which is famous for making some of the best dark teas available.

enabled.description: Whether the app is enabled to be viewed by everyone

enforceTargetAmount.description: Whether contributions over the set target amount are allowed

startDate.description: UNIX timestamp for crowdfund start time (https://www.unixtimestamp.com/)

endDate.description: UNIX timestamp for crowdfund end time (https://www.unixtimestamp.com/)

mainImageUrl.description: URL for image used as a cover image for the app

notificationUrl.description: Callback notification url to POST to once when invoice is paid for and once when there are enough blockchain confirmations

tagline.description: Tagline for the app displayed to user
tagline.example: I can't believe it's not butter

disqusEnabled.description: Whether Disqus is enabled for the app

disqusShortname.description: Disqus shortname to used for the app

soundsEnabled.description: Whether sounds on new contributions are enabled

animationsEnabled.description: Whether background animations on new contributions are enabled

sortPerksByPopularity.description: Whether perks are sorted by popularity

sounds.description: Array of custom sounds which can be used on new contributions

animationColors.description: Array of custom HEX colors which can be used for background animations on new contributions

htmlLang.description: Used for SEO, the [HTML Lang](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/lang) of the page

htmlMetaTags.description: Used for SEO, the [Meta tags](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/meta) of the page

formId.description: Form ID to request customer data

perksTemplate.description: JSON of perks available in the app

perks.description: JSON of perks available in the app

title.description: The display name of the item

description.description: A description text for the item

image.description: An image URL for the item

buyButtonText.description: A custom text for the buy button for the item

disabled.description: If true, the item does not appear in the list by default.

date.description: UNIX timestamp of the beginning of that day

total.description: The total amount of sales of that item

totalFormatted.description: The formatted total amount of sales of that item
